Like all ursines, the grizzly bear will become enraged if badly hurt or frightened.}} ==Useful Info== '''Grizzly bears''' are slightly larger versions of [[black bear]]s. There's nothing particularly special about them. Bears are usually found in [[the Lair]] and have a tendency to go [[berserk]] when heavily injured. ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number= |slot1=''none'' |slot2=''none'' |slot3=''none'' |slot4=''none'' |slot5=''none'' |slot6=[[Berserker Rage]] }} {{clear}} ==Tips & Tricks== Squishy spellcasters should try to take them out from a distance, as an angry bear in your face is less than desirable. Melee characters should be able to handle them with little difficulty. ==History== Grizzly bears were removed in [[0.15]]. Prior to [[0.6]], grizzly bears did not berserk.
